item.title: Re: Question about Season 1 and Themes
item.content:encoded:
My understanding is that Themes are permanent. Once you've unlocked it, you keep it forever, no matter how many more times you loop. I can't say this with absolute certainty, because I'm still in Season 1, but the "Impossible Mission" requires that you have the Sannin WhiteEye, RedEye, and Legacy themes to pass one of the steps, and you can't have all three of those in a single season. Which leads me to believe that themes loop forever.

At the very least, if you get Lucky 7s in season 1, you'll keep it into season 2.

item.title: Question about Season 1 and Themes
item.content:encoded:
Can you earn themes in Season 1 and then carry those achievements over into Season 2, even if you can't use them during Season 1?

As an example, if you got the Lucky 7's trophy or Billy lvl. 2 or True Blood of the Reaper before looping for the first time, would you get the themes for those after looping?

(Lucky 7 would be particularly nice for reducing the time spent in re-acquiring my allies.)
